name: Enboarder
description: Enboarder goes beyond onboarding. It's your Human Connection Platform, fostering belonging throughout the employee journey. From day one to career growth, we cut through the noise and connect people with the tools and support they need to thrive. Build a culture of connection and inclusion – boost retention, engagement, and success at every stage.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Creating better human connections
ShortDescription: Make onboarding more than a process - connect new hires to colleagues, information, and programs that fuel their success from day one.

Highlights.name: Launchpad to Success
Highlights.description: Craft onboarding experiences that make new hires feel seen, supported, and excited to contribute.

Highlights.name: Seamless Transitions
Highlights.description: Facilitate successful internal moves and reorient returning employees with clear guidance and connections.

Highlights.name: Boost Engagement
Highlights.description: Empower individuals with personalized development journeys and timely nudges to stay motivated and fulfilled.

enhanced_description: Enboarder is positioned as a Human Connection Platform that extends beyond traditional onboarding to foster a sense of belonging throughout the entire employee journey. It aims to cut through noise and connect individuals with the essential tools and support needed for their success, from their very first day to their ongoing career growth. The platform helps organizations cultivate a culture of connection and inclusion by crafting engaging onboarding experiences that make new hires feel seen, supported, and excited to contribute. Additionally, it facilitates seamless internal transitions and reorients returning employees with clear guidance and connections. Enboarder also empowers individuals with personalized development journeys and timely nudges, ultimately boosting retention, engagement, and overall employee success.
key_use_cases: Building a Culture of Connection and Inclusion
competitive_advantages: Goes beyond traditional onboarding, focusing on the entire employee journey as a Human Connection Platform
roi_benefits: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
